name: sans epik cool adventure
description:
WINDOWS USERS
Extract goofy-sans-game and run the goofy-sans-game.exe file. Ignore Smartscreen, not bothered to sign the executable.

MACOS USERS
Extract the goofy-sans-game folder. I do not have $100/yr to pay for an Apple Developer Account, so you will get gatekeeper warnings. To skip them, open Finder > Navigate to the application > Right click > Open > Open. Sorry about the inconvenience.

LINUX USERS
Extract the goofy-sans-game folder. Run start.sh.
